title: Start
body:
Hello, Vincent
[[Hello|#1]]
[[<<Inventory.Has(Ribbon)>>I think i found a ribbon that you can use to make the nest more solid|#9]]

You came to look for the star, am I right?
[[Yes. Are you looking for it too?|#2]]
[[Yes. Do you think you can help Rupert to take his hat off the tree? He really needs it|#8]]

I wish I was! But I've had a bit of an argue with Vivi - she doesn't like a nest I built for her, not one bit!
[[Oh|#3]]

And now she won't let we leave until I fix it! Tell me, what do you think of the nest?
[[Well... It's not that bad, it just needs something to make it solid and safe|#4]]

I hope I will come with something soon, so I can fix it and go searching for the star just like others
[[Why do you need a star for?|#5]]

To make Vivi less grumpy - she's always so picky about everything I do
[[Maybe you should just try a little harder? I bet Vivi would appreciate it|#6]]

Um, maybe, I'm not sure. Anyway, now I really need to fix that poor nest somehow. 
[[I'll let you know if I find something useful|#7]]

Sorry, I'm very busy right now - I have to fix the nest i build, because Vivi hates it
[[Oh, I see|#3]]

You really did? That's great! And it's pretty too, Vivi'll like it. Thank you, Vincent!
[[What are you going to do now?|#10]]

I was going to look for the star, but I guess, you were right and I just need to put more effort into things
[[Good for you|#11]]

After all, it doesn't take a lot to make Vivi happy, and it certainly doesn't take any magic!
[[Any chance we can get Rupert's hat now?|#12]]
